Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific User Story to a specific Sprint.

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific Worker to a specific Task.

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific Team to a specific Project.

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: Integer variable to set the priority of a Feature (e.g., on a scale from 1 to 5).

Name: set_task_effort_estimate
Description: Integer variable for the estimated effort of a Task in hours.

Name: include_feature_in_release
Description: Binary decision whether a Feature should be part of a specific Release Plan.

Name: set_project_budget
Description: Float variable to determine the budget for a Project.

Name: select_sprint_duration
Description: Integer variable to choose the length of a sprint in days from a set of standard options.

Name: set_team_size
Description: Integer variable to determine the number of members in a Team.

Name: accept_user_story_in_review
Description: Binary decision made by the Product Owner to accept a User Story during the Sprint Review.

Name: change_task_status
Description: Categorical variable to update the status of a Task (e.g., Todo, InProgress, Done).

Name: select_worker_for_team
Description: Binary decision whether a specific Worker is selected to be a member of a specific Team.
